title: Islam and the sciences
creator_credit: Peter De Normanville, Douglas Gordon and Phoenix Films
brief_description: A comprehensive look at the influence of the Islamic world on the sciences from the seventh century A.D. to the present. Surveying the history of its scientific and technological advances in the fields of astronomy, mathematics, water resources and power generation, time measurement, geography and cartography, chemistry and medicine.
